name: INEVIFIT EROS Bluetooth Body Fat Scale Smart BMI Highly Accurate Digital Bathroom Body Composition Analyzer with Wireless Smartphone APP 400 lbs 11.8 x 11.8 inch (Black)

other_info.Special Feature: Smart, Muscle Mass, Body Fat, Body Mass Index

about_this_item: ENJOY TRACKING YOUR FITNESS JOURNEY: This smart body composition scale tracks 13 key fitness metrics, including Body Weight, Body Fat Percentage, Water, Muscle Mass, BMI, BMR, Bone Mass, Skeletal Muscle, Fat-Free Body Weight, Subcutaneous Fat, Protein, Metabolic Age and even Visceral Fat directly on your smartphone.

POWERFUL FREE APP: The Eros Scale app is simple to use, supports unlimited number of profiles for you and your whole family to get & stay healthy. The best part is that it seamlessly syncs with your favorite health apps & services: Fitbit, Apple Health, and Google Fit.

PREMIUM QUALITY: Upgraded auto-calibrating sensors for precise and consistent measurements on a thicker 6mm tempered glass platform to weigh up to 400 lbs. Finally, a durable body weight scale you can depend on that stands the test of time.

DELIGHTFUL EXPERIENCE: Designed here in Southern California to complement the d√©cor in any room yet be functionally efficient. The large 3.6‚Äù luminous LED display, turns on automatically when you step on and your body composition appear in your smartphone with a simple touch.

STAY CALM & GET YOUR TRACK ON: The Eros Smart Scale comes with 7-day real USA customer support and our products include the industry leading quality. You can rest assure that you will be 100% satisfied with the INEVIFIT experience.

title: Use it every day; like the data
content: Best scale I‚Äôve had so far.  Seems accurate and is definitely more repeatable than any other scale I‚Äôve had.  Weight is in 0.2 increments, which is ok.  iPhone app connection often takes many seconds to connect, wish it were faster but it works.  The app works well and shows a lot of potentially useful data.  Not sure how accurate the foot sensor info really is, but it‚Äôs interesting.  Overall, a great scale and highly recommended
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: This scale has really helped me dial in my meals and make me accountable for what I consume on a daily basis. The app on the phone is great to track your day to day progress. First month tracking with it down 8Lbs and 1% body fat.

title: Tells me more about my bodily health.
content: This is a very nice (bathroom) scale.. I love the design.. Thin sleek look.. My husband thought it was funny how it was shipped in the original box and not in another one to cover up what it was.. No worry to me.. It was easy to install the app.. The only bad thing and this may be user error is that it took me about 15 to 20 min to figure out how to get all the tiles to give me their readings.. But it was just as simple as going into my phone settings and pairing the scale with my phone and there it was working.. Once paired it makes the cutest sound when you step on it and it is recieved to your phone.. My phone is a Android.. But I will say I would buy more products from this company.. This scale compared to my other scale was only off by 4 to 6 oz.. Not much to complain about.. I'm a big stickler to watching my weight and that few oz off aka difference didn't bother me at all..
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020

title: Verified Purchase
content: It‚Äôs been about a week and this is great scale giving me a lot of info that I still need to figure out what it all means. My only complaint is the syncing with the app part. It says you have to remain still for at least 9 seconds for everything to load. There‚Äôs no sync button on the app so you have to wait and see if it syncs. Sometimes it takes a few minutes or opening and closing the app? I think I just have to get used to the delay but might be nice to have a sync button on the app. But it is all linked up with my apple health app and is super nice to streamline all the data to see what‚Äôs really working for my health!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2022

title: Great scale!
content: I really like the way this scale shifts my focus away from strictly weight as a measure of health to more important metrics.  I'm 53, and have spent too many years being sedentary.  I recently started a fitness program and if I were to just look at the weight loss it would be entirely too easy to get discouraged.  But by seeing the muscle gain and the lowering of my BMI, I get the reassurance that I'm doing the right thing and am motivated to improve those numbers week by week. Highly recommend, whether you are working towards a goal or just want to monitor your healthy body composition.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
